DOC.brief_summary: To determine whether liposomal bupivacaine wound infiltration decrease pain score narcotic use compare bupivacaine alone open reduction internal fixation midshaft clavicle fracture .
DOC.brief_title: Does Liposomal Bupivacaine Provide Improved Pain Management ORIF Midshaft Clavicle Fractures ?
